title: ASUS VY279HE-W 27” 1080P Monitor - White, Full HD, 75Hz, IPS, Adaptive-Sync/FreeSync, Eye Care Plus, Color Augmentation, Rest Reminder, HDMI, VGA, Frameless, VESA Wall Mountable
description: The 27” VY279HE-W monitor is equipped with Eye Care Plus, the VY279HE-W features additional color augmentation and rest reminder modes for a more user-friendly experience.
